title: Marco Angel Pérez
text:
Marco Ángel Pérez (born 27 September 1977) is a <a href="Mexican%20people">Mexican</a> former professional <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> who competed from 1996 to 2012. He held the <a href="World%20Boxing%20Council">WBC</a> FECARBOX <a href="super%20featherweight">super featherweight</a> title.
Professional career.
WBC FECARBOX title.
In July 1999, Pérez upset the veteran Ernesto Benitez by T.K.O. to win the <a href="World%20Boxing%20Council">WBC FECARBOX</a> <a href="Super%20Featherweight">Super Featherweight</a> Championship.
On May 17, 2002 Marco Angel lost to <a href="Mexican%20people">Mexican</a> <a href="Humberto%20Soto">Humberto Soto</a>, the bout was at the <a href="Orleans%20Hotel%20and%20Casino">Orleans Hotel and Casino</a> in <a href="Las%20Vegas%20Valley">Las Vegas</a>, <a href="Nevada">Nevada</a>.
